WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is by design, Silverlight does not allow saving to a file without user specifying the file.
WorkItem.Description:
In Rawr2.x, Save saved to the currently opened profile file and Save as... prompted for a file name.  In Rawr3, Save always prompts for the file name.
